name: Jellyfish Girl Apocalypse
description:
Jellyfish Girl Apocalypse is a Renpy game about saving the world from flesh-eating jellyfish monster women! Well, that's what it's supposed to be about, but our main character is a bit of a wimp. And a simp. And a weeb. He also has amnesia, so that sucks.

Play as the nameable MC and date  defeat the monsters wreaking havoc in Briny city! Who knows where your choices in this situation will lead you? I do. But I'm not telling you! Discover for yourself! There are 9 endings to find. Have fun! Or don't, I won't hold you at gunpoint or anything! Haha! (Holds you at gunpoint)
